Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 3,876 RSF Sublease Space Available in Wayne, PA

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Under NEW ownership — Equus Capital Partners — headquartered locally in Newtown Square with a longstanding history of owning, operating and redeveloping/developing along the corridor.
Exciting renovations and improvements including new lobbies
Immediate access to Routes 202, 252, 422, I-76 and the Pennsylvania Turnpike

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Ideally located in the highly amenitized and sought after submarket for premier tenants: the East Swedesford Road Corridor. With boundaries extending from the Gateway Shopping Center to the I-76/Route 202 Interchange, the East Swedesford corridor offers large-scale amenities like the King of Prussia Town Center, the  Gateway Shopping Center and the King of Prussia Mall. With amenity and residential access, this destination offers a significant edge to attract and retain the “best and brightest” talent. Within a mile from the property is Lifetime Fitness and the Village at Valley Forge, a development project comprised of Wegmans, Davio’s Northern Italian Steakhouse, Fogo De Chao, and five new residential developments. Accessibility is second to none, within minutes of major connecting routes to all of Southeastern Pennsylvania, Northern Delaware, and Southern and Central New Jersey, including Routes 202, 252, 422, I-76 and the Pennsylvania Turnpike.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Premiere Block of 25,315 SF Available - 440/460 E Swedesford Road
